summary: My second follower mod with 4 different hairs to choose from.
descriptionHtml:

Name: Frida
Race: Nord
Voice:  Female Young Eager
Marriageable: Yes
Weight:  40
Body: UNP
Skin: Real Girls
Armor: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27060/?]Demon Hunter Armor[/url]
Weapon: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64440/?]Real Bows[/url]
Class: Combat Ranger
Levels with player.
Spells: healing hands, healing

Perks: agile defender, ranger, quick hands, recovery, overdraw, criticalshot,  deftmovement, alteration, lightfoot,bullseye, agile defender, stealth, deadlyaim

[b][u]She's now available on Xbox One :)[/u][/b]
[size=4]
Screenshots are appreciated!
If you have any questions/request pm me! :)
[/size]You can also get her [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/80326/?]preset[/url]!!
